00025 
00026 namespace Spark
00027 {
00028 
00029 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 
00032 class SpTimer
00033 {
00034 
00036 public:
00037 
00038     enum TimerState
00039     {
00040         TS_OFF,
00041         TS_ON,
00042         TS_HOLD,
00043         TS_COUNT
00044     };
00045 
00047 public:
00048 
00049     SpTimer();
00050     ~SpTimer();
00051 
00053 public:
00054 
00055     void start();
00056     void stop();
00057 
00058     void suspend();
00059     void resume();
00060     void reset();
00061     void count();
00062 
00063     float elapsedTime();
00064     unsigned int elapsedCount();
00065     unsigned int elapsedHours();
00066     unsigned int elapsedMinutes();
00067     unsigned int elapsedSeconds();
00068     unsigned int elapsedMilliseconds();
00069 
00070     unsigned int seconds();
00071     unsigned int milliseconds();
00072 
00074 private:
00075 
00076     static unsigned int s_uiSecondsFrequency;
00077     static unsigned int s_uiMillisecondsFrequency;
00078     static float s_fInvSecFrequency;
00079 
00080     // state data members
00081     unsigned int m_uiStartTime;
00082     unsigned int m_uiStopTime;
00083     unsigned int m_uiTimeDelta;
00084     unsigned int m_uiElapsedCount;
00085     TimerState m_eState;
00086

00089 
00091 private:
00092
